original_text: Now Abraham moved on from there into the region of the Negev and lived between Kadesh and Shur. For a while he stayed in Gerar,
korean_text: 아브라함이 거기서 네게브 땅으로 옮겨가 가데스와 술 사이 그랄에 거류하며

sentences.original_text: Now Abraham moved on from there
into the region of the Negev
and lived between Kadesh and Shur
For a while he stayed in Gerar
